title: inline serif
content:
does anybody know what font this is? there are a lot of similar ones out there but i want an exact match. Thank You.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [0000 what is it.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20140330063119/http:/typophile.com/files/0000%20what%20is%20it_0.png) | 153.04 KB |
author: candybo

comments.content:
It looks like what might happen to [Castellar](http://web.archive.org/web/20140330063119/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/castellar-mt/) if it were stretched slightly and artificially made bolder (sharpness would be blunted and interior spaces made smaller).

Edit: Ya beat me to it, Les.
